title: The Next Costume Institute Exhibit Will Celebrate Black Dandyism
description: On Wednesday morning, the Costume Institute of the Metropolitan Museum of Art unveiled the theme for its upcoming fashion exhibit: "Superfine: Tailoring Black Style."Â Anna Wintour, Pharrell Williams, Lewis Hamilton, A$AP Rocky and Colman Domingo will serve as co-chairs for the associated ...Continue reading
author: Fashionista
